title: Marching Through a Novel - novelist and characters

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Updike uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complex relationship between the novelist and the characters in the novel.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Updike uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complex relationship between the novelist and the characters in the novel.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
